segments.text: I can't believe what's happening in this kitchen scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying dishes, completely unaware of the flood at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the sink is cascading down like a waterfall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's going to ruin the floor if she doesn't stop it soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Behind her, the boy on the stool is reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it's about to collapse under him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is egging him on, her arm extended eagerly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're stealing cookies right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The apron she's wearing is getting wet from the splashes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, everything outside is so orderly and bright.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This contrast makes the inside seem even more hectic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the woman; she's going to be upset when she sees this.
segments.speaker: PAR
